tool_description: First Linktastic API to test with
name: Linktastic API 1
title: Linktastic API 1

api_list.name: returnAFolder

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

required_parameters.name: folder_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the folder to act upon.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{{grant_id}}/folders/{{folder_id}}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{grant_id}/folders/{folder_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: retrieveYourScheduledMessages
api_list.description: This API returns the messages that you have scheduled. It returns both messages that have been, sent and messages that are still waiting to be sent.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{{grant_id}}/messages/schedules"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: returnAllDrafts

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the Grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the Grant associated with an access token.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of objects to return. This field defaults to 50. The maximum allowed value for this field is 200.  See [pagination](#section/Pagination) for more information.

api_list.name: returnAllCalendars
downloadAnAttachment

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

required_parameters.name: attachment_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the attachment to act upon.

optional_parameters.name: message_id
optional_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the message the attachment belongs to.

api_list.name: retrieveAScheduledMessage
api_list.description: This API returns a scheduled message. It returns both messages that have been sent, and messages that have not yet been sent.

required_parameters.name: scheduleId
required_parameters.description: (Required) The ID of the schedule to retrieve.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{{grant_id}}/messages/schedules/{{schedule_id}}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{grant_id}/messages/schedules/{scheduleid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: returnAThread
api_list.description: Returns a thread by ID (not available for IMAP).

required_parameters.name: thread_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the thread to act upon.

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{{grant_id}}/threads/{{thread_id}}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: returnAllThreads
api_list.description: Returns all threads. Not available for IMAP.

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of objects to return. This field defaults to 20. The maximum allowed value for this field is 50. See [pagination](#pagination) for more information.

api_list.name: returnMetadataOfAnAttachment

required_parameters.name: attachment_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the attachment to act upon.

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

optional_parameters.name: message_id
optional_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the message the attachment belongs to.

api_list.name: returnADraft

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the Grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the Grant associated with an access token. See the [Drafts documentation](/docs/api/v3-beta/ecc/#tag--Drafts) for more information.

required_parameters.name: draft_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the Draft to act upon.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/grants/{{grant_id}}/drafts/{{draft_id}}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "linktastic-api-1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: returnAllMessages

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of objects to return. This field defaults to 50. The maximum allowed value for this field is 200.  See [pagination](#section/Pagination) for more information.

api_list.name: returnAMessage

required_parameters.name: message_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the message to act upon.

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Return message with headers by specifying "include_headers".

api_list.name: returnAnEvent

required_parameters.name: grant_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the grant to act upon. Use "me" to refer to the grant associated with an access token.

required_parameters.name: event_id
required_parameters.description: (Required) ID of the event to act upon.

optional_parameters.name: calendar_id
optional_parameters.description: (Required) Specify calendar ID of the event.  "primary" is a supported value indicating the user's primary calendar.
